revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G1; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/10/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883596027 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B008I21EA2 |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2012/12/17 G", "48SAB402.SCE", and addl. PCB manuf. text (date code of ''1251'', Dec. 2012) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. A MAC label affixed to the Ethernet ports indicates usage of a 00:25:9C OUI, which seems unlikely.
This device has a single USB 3.0 port and a single USB 2.0 port.
Configuration with ''Belkin-Linksys'''s utility may confer a [[Cisco Connect SSIDs|SSID pattern typical of the ''Cisco Connect'' software]].
{{WiFiCert|WFA20250|07/03/2013}}
===Additional specifications=== per [[Linksys]] manual *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::256 mm x 40 mm x 184 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::501 g]]
Power supplies shown in the FCC external photos are... *'''Solytech Enterprise Corporation''' CAD4212 [CAD4212CW-1] (NEMA 1-15P plug) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60 Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A *'''Solytech Enterprise Corporation''' CAD4212L [CAD4212LW-1] (Euro plug) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60 Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A *''unbranded'' MU42-1120350-A1 (NEMA 1-15P) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60 Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A *''unbranded'' IU42-1120350-WP (Euro plug) **100-240VAC ~ 50-60 Hz, 1.5A -> 12VDC, 3.5A
[[Category:English Documentation]]
